paragraphs: At Dyst.IO, we specialize in revolutionizing offline engagement through dynamic QR technology. Since our inception, we’ve been committed to helping businesses seamlessly connect their offline and online worlds.
OUR VALUE
Revolutionize customer engagement with real-time, interactive QR code solutions.
Gain actionable data to refine strategies and boost your business impact.
Designed to grow with your needs, from startups to global brands.
Whether you're a school, organization, or community group, Dyst.IO is here to simplify offline engagement and enhance interactions. Let's collaborate to create meaningful experiences.
No Credit Card Required
Free For 30 Day Trial.
Money Back Guarente.
Empowering businesses with dynamic QR solutions to drive connections, enhance marketing, and unlock real-time insights. Simplify campaigns, track results, and innovate effortlessly with Dyst.io.

GET IN TOUCH
Have questions or want to explore how we can transform your business? Reach out to us today—our team is here to help you take the next step.
101, 1st-floor, Start-up Building, Behind Anand motors, Vidhan Sabha Marg, Lucknow - 226001
CONTACT
Transform how your business interacts with customers using Dyst.IO’s innovative QR code solutions and real-time analytics.
Engage shoppers with dynamic, actionable QR codes.
From ticketing to merchandise, make every interaction count.
Digital menus, personalized promotions, and more.
Instant access to property details and virtual tours.
Enhance learning with interactive, real-time engagement.
UBoost orders and customer experience with dynamic QR codes.

Seamlessly integrate offline and online experiences to boost customer engagement Transform your mall’s marketing strategy with dynamic, data-driven QR codes. Enhance your in-mall promotions with real-time analytics, drive foot traffic, and measure the success of your campaigns—all through one intuitive platform.

Turn Every QR into a Gateway
Transform your mall’s marketing materials—whether physical or digital—into interactive, actionable experiences that drive customer engagement and conversions.

Collect Real-Time Data
Harness the power of dynamic QR codes to gather valuable first-party data. Understand customer preferences, measure campaign effectiveness, and optimize marketing efforts—all through live analytics.

Track Engagement & Optimize Campaigns
Get comprehensive insights into how customers interact with your campaigns in real time. Our platform provides A/B testing, conversion tracking, and detailed analytics that help you fine-tune your strategy and increase ROI.
FAQ’S

Here, you'll find answers to common questions about our dynamic QR code solutions, including how they work, the benefits for your business, and how to get started. If you need further assistance, our support team is always here to help!
Engage Your Offline Audience Like Never Before
Dyst.IO solves the challenge of untracked offline engagement by transforming static QR codes into dynamic, actionable tools that drive measurable results for businesses.

Your QR codes should not only work well—they should look good too! Explore our unique and customizable QR code designs that blend functionality with aesthetics, making them an integral part of your branding. Whether you need a minimalist design or a creative, brand-centric code, we've got you covered.
EXPLORE OUR FEATURES
Discover the tools you need to elevate customer interactions, track performance, and drive conversions effortlessly.
Time your QR campaigns to perfection.
Data that drives smarter decisions.
Never lose a potential lead.
Build trust with personalized designs.
WHY DYST.IO?

At Dyst.IO, we don’t just provide QR codes—we provide dynamic solutions that help businesses connect, engage, and convert like never before. Our platform is designed to meet the modern needs of businesses looking to bridge the gap between offline engagement and online conversions.
Unlike static QR codes, Dyst.IO offers dynamic QR codes that can be customized, tracked, and updated in real time. Gain valuable insights into customer behavior and campaign performance.
With our slot management feature, businesses have full control over when and how their QR codes are active. Tailor your campaigns to specific timeframes, maximizing impact and relevancy.
Our platform allows businesses to integrate their brand logos and messaging directly into the QR code design, creating a seamless and trustworthy experience for customers.

Unlock the full potential of your marketing strategy with Dyst.IO. Our platform delivers real-time analytics, providing businesses with valuable insights to optimize customer interactions, improve engagement, and drive conversions.

Date: 06-DEC-2024
Welcome to Dyst.IO! Your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.
We do not sell your personal information. However, we may share data with:
We use advanced encryption and secure storage to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
You have the right to access and update your personal information by logging into your account. If you wish to delete your data, you can contact us directly at [Insert Email].

We use cookies to enhance your user experience and gather analytics. While you can disable cookies through your browser settings, please note that this may affect the functionality of certain features on our site.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be communicated via our website or through email notifications to ensure you are informed.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. You can contact us via email at info.dyst.io@gmail.com. Your trust is important to us, and we are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your information. Thank you for choosing Dyst.IO!

Welcome to Dyst.IO. By accessing and using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our website or services.
By using Dyst.IO, you agree to these Terms and Conditions, along with our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not access or use our services.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using our services.

Dyst.IO will not be held liable for any damages arising from the use of our services, including but not limited to loss of data, loss of business, or any indirect or consequential damages.
